item.title: Troubleshoot when using terraformer with tfenv
item.description: Removing & installing packages are some annoying, isn’t it? So, I like using version managers like SDKMAN, nvm, etc.. I also use tfenv for terraform version management. (prev post: KR/‘Terraform 시작하기 w/Minimal Ubuntu’) And I recommend neighbors to use terraformer for first learning about terraform. terraformer is a great terraform generator tool for converting existing cloud infrastructure to terraform code. In this post, I write how I use terraformer with tfenv.
